content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at position(-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56)
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)

### Manufacturing Complex at position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Two assembling machines at (14.5, 14.5) and (21.5, 15.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and chests for input/output
- Connected by transport belts
- Small electric poles connecting to power source

### Power Generation Complex at position(43.5, 19.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at (37.5, 19.0)
- Multiple pipe networks for water/steam transport

### Water Pumping Stations
Three offshore pumps at:
- (-7.5, 25.5)
- (2.5, 34.5)
- (2.5, 36.5)

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production facilities:
- Belt networks connecting mining operations to smelting
- Belt systems feeding materials to assembling machines
- Complex pipe networks for fluid transport

ERROR TIPS

### Fluid Connection Errors
- Ensure proper connection points are clear and unblocked when connecting fluid entities
- Check that pipe networks are properly connected between pumps, boilers, and steam engines

### Power Distribution Issues
- Verify that power poles are properly connected to form a complete electrical network
- Ensure power generating equipment (steam engines) are receiving required resources (water/steam)

### Production Line Issues
- Make sure inserters have proper fuel supply
- Verify that assembling machines have all required input materials
- Check that output storage (chests) have available space

### Entity Placement Issues
- Ensure sufficient clear space when placing new entities
- Check for blocked connection points when setting up fluid networks
- Verify entity orientation matches intended input/output flow
